bill_title: revise certain references to the Internal Revenue Code.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to revise certain references to the Internal Revenue Code. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That § 10-1-47 be AMENDED: 10-1-47. The term, United States Internal Revenue Code, or Internal Revenue Code, means the United States Internal Revenue Code as amended and in effect on January 1, 2023 2024. This section applies to §§ 10-4-9.1, 10-4-9.2, 10-4-9.3, 10-4-9.4, 10-4-39, 10-6-157, and 10-43-10.1, and subdivisions 10-6A-1(7), 10-6B-1(5), 10-18A-1(6), 10-43-10.3(6), and 10-45A-1(5).
